About us

The Beginnings of Our School: In 1998, our school began with just a few classes. It developed into the busy campus you see today over time.

Our school is an excellent place to learn because of the collaborative efforts of our principal, teachers, and staff.

Where We Are: Situated in Gikondo, our school is in the center of Kigali (Rwanda.)
